description: Modern inventory management system with enhanced notification capabilities

tasks.title: SSL Certificate Generation System
tasks.description: Implement automatic SSL certificate generation for production deployment
tasks.details: Create PowerShell scripts and API endpoints for automatic SSL certificate generation using Let's Encrypt for production and self-signed certificates for development. This is critical for production deployment security.
tasks.testStrategy: Test certificate generation in development environment, verify HTTPS functionality, and validate certificate renewal process.

tasks.title: Push Notifications Infrastructure
tasks.description: Implement browser push notifications with VAPID authentication
tasks.details: Set up Web Push API integration with VAPID keys, create Service Worker for handling push notifications, and implement subscription management API endpoints.
tasks.testStrategy: Test push notification delivery in different browsers, verify VAPID key management, and validate subscription persistence.

tasks.title: Notification Analytics Dashboard
tasks.description: Create comprehensive analytics for notification effectiveness and user engagement
tasks.details: Implement metrics collection for notification delivery, open rates, click-through rates, and user engagement patterns. Create dashboard widgets for real-time analytics.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify metrics accuracy, test real-time updates, and validate data export functionality.

tasks.title: Notification Scheduling System
tasks.description: Implement scheduled notifications using Hangfire job scheduler
tasks.details: Integrate Hangfire for background job processing, create models for scheduled notifications, and implement UI for managing notification schedules.
tasks.testStrategy: Test scheduled notification delivery, verify job persistence, and validate schedule management UI.

tasks.title: Webhook Support System
tasks.description: Implement webhook endpoints for external system integrations
tasks.details: Create webhook endpoint management, implement retry logic with exponential backoff, and add webhook signature verification for security.
tasks.testStrategy: Test webhook delivery reliability, verify retry mechanisms, and validate signature verification.

tasks.title: Enhanced SignalR Notifications
tasks.description: Improve existing SignalR notification system with better grouping and delivery
tasks.details: Enhance NotificationHub with better user grouping, implement notification preferences, and add delivery confirmation tracking.
tasks.testStrategy: Test real-time delivery, verify user grouping functionality, and validate notification preferences.

tasks.title: Third-party Integration Framework
tasks.description: Create framework for integrating with external services (Slack, Teams, Discord, Telegram)
tasks.details: Implement integration services for popular communication platforms, create template system for different message formats, and add configuration UI for each service.
tasks.testStrategy: Test integration with each platform, verify message formatting, and validate configuration management.

tasks.title: Mobile App Infrastructure
tasks.description: Prepare infrastructure for .NET MAUI mobile applications
tasks.details: Create .NET MAUI projects for Android and iOS, implement native push notification support, and adapt existing UI components for mobile devices.
tasks.testStrategy: Test mobile app functionality, verify native push notifications, and validate offline capabilities.

tasks.title: Database Schema Updates
tasks.description: Update database schema to support new notification features
tasks.details: Create new tables for push subscriptions, notification metrics, scheduled notifications, and webhook endpoints. Update existing models as needed.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify schema changes with migrations, test data integrity, and validate performance impact.

tasks.title: API Documentation Updates
tasks.description: Update Swagger/OpenAPI documentation for new notification endpoints
tasks.details: Document all new API endpoints for push notifications, analytics, scheduling, and webhooks. Include examples and authentication requirements.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify API documentation accuracy, test example requests, and validate authentication flows.

tasks.title: Security Enhancements
tasks.description: Implement additional security measures for notification system
tasks.details: Add rate limiting for notification endpoints, implement webhook signature verification, and enhance VAPID key security management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test rate limiting effectiveness, verify signature validation, and validate key rotation process.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize notification system performance and scalability
tasks.details: Implement caching for notification templates, optimize database queries, and add performance monitoring for notification delivery.
tasks.testStrategy: Load test notification system, verify performance metrics, and validate scalability improvements.

tasks.title: Testing Infrastructure
tasks.description: Create comprehensive test suite for notification features
tasks.details: Create unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for all notification features. Include mock services for external integrations.
tasks.testStrategy: Achieve high test coverage, verify test reliability, and validate CI/CD integration.

tasks.title: Deployment Automation
tasks.description: Update deployment scripts to support new notification features
tasks.details: Update Docker configurations, deployment scripts, and environment setup to include new notification services and database changes.
tasks.testStrategy: Test deployment in staging environment, verify service startup, and validate configuration management.

tasks.title: User Documentation
tasks.description: Create user documentation for new notification features
tasks.details: Write user guides for push notification setup, analytics dashboard usage, notification scheduling, and webhook configuration.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation accuracy, test user workflows, and validate clarity of instructions.
